channel.title: Npc drop
channel.description: ok, i added new npc's to my server.. they code in no problems.. but then i go to npc drop and add items for them to drop, but they drop nothing, whats wrong?

item.title: Npc drop
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

[quote=“1 vitiello 1, post:2, topic:220814”]i can help with that one, i ask the same thing and got help
problem is npcdrop dosent do anything
go into ur item2.java thing
next find the monster u want to give the drops to,
next u should see sum item ids,
change the item ids to whateva u want[/quote]

Lol, not THAT easy xD the tut I just gave you is way more explained, mcczzcbm, i’ll give you a link to it.
